response.original_title: 1 0 / 3 1: K N I G H T S
response.overview: Three elite mercenaries must embark on a rescue mission of critical importance when one of their own inadvertently causes a town to spur into civil disorder as his past path of reprisal against a brutal collective of evil triggers a crippling domino affect-casting everything it touches into dismay. The third installment of the '10/31' series serves as an introspective overlook at the events since the start of the story, and maybe even further...
response.tagline: B E L I E V E  I N  T H E  D A R K.
response.title: 1 0 / 3 1: K N I G H T S
